## blur13 variable

13x13 gaussian blur texture lookup, optimized, but based on:

- [http://rastergrid.com/blog/2010/09/efficient-gaussian-blur-with-linear-sampling/](http://rastergrid.com/blog/2010/09/efficient-gaussian-blur-with-linear-sampling/) - [https://github.com/Jam3/glsl-fast-gaussian-blur](https://github.com/Jam3/glsl-fast-gaussian-blur)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
blur13: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn4<"sampler2D", "vec2", "vec2", "vec2", "vec4">
```
